code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ForecastPlayback=_ref=>{let{forecast}=_ref;const[currentIndex,setCurrentIndex]=useState(0);const handlePlay=()=>{let index=currentIndex;const interval=setInterval(()=>{if(index<forecast.list.length-1){index++;setCurrentIndex(index);}else{clearInterval(interval);}},3000);};const handlePause=()=>{setCurrentIndex(0);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handlePlay,className:"bg-green-500 text-white p-2 mr-2",children:"Play"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handlePause,className:"bg-red-500 text-white p-2",children:"Pause"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:forecast.list[currentIndex].dt_txt}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Temperature: ",forecast.list[currentIndex].main.temp," \xB0C"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Weather: ",forecast.list[currentIndex].weather[0].description]})]})]});};export default ForecastPlayback;
